text:
Had done ten and tens of DC in-place upgrades. Starting 2008 . No issues. 
Of course, if You have other random roles on DC - upgrade goes little more
complex and may be even be blocked (for example CA)
If You have complex infrastructure and dependencies - its easier/faster and
failsafe than install new version to another machine and later do all name/IP
changes. 
--
Andres P

metadata.subject: Vs: [patchmanagement] Extended Security Updates for Server 2012R2
